New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 50th ODI century, breaking Sachin Tendulkar's record
Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs, the best figures for India in ODIs
Key Match Events: India posted 397-4 in Mumbai, the highest score in a men's World Cup knockout game
Daryl Mitchell scored 134 for New Zealand, but it wasn't enough to win
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will face either Australia or South Africa in Sunday's final
